comments:
On my own editor, when I click on an 'extensible element' then go to the Properties sheet and select the 'Extensibility' tab, I get an error:  Problems occurred when invoking code from plug-in: "org.eclipse.ui.views.properties.tabbed".  

The setInput(IWorkbenchPart part, ISelection selection) method of the W11ExtensionsSection class calls two methods from the WSDLAdapter class:  [1]lookupOrCreateModelAdapter(Document document)[2] getModelReconcileAdapter() 

The first method call (lookupOrCreateModelAdapter(Document document)), return adapter.  Adapter is of type WSDLModelAdapter that contains definition, modelReconcileAdapter and resourseSet of which ALL are null.  

The second method call:

public ModelReconcileAdapter getModelReconcileAdapter()
  {
    return modelReconcileAdapter;
  } 

This returns  null because it goes into the adapter object (which was returned from the lookupOrCreateModelAdapter method) and retrieves modelReconcileAdapter. modelReconcileAdapter is NULL! 

Below is the event stack trace:

============================================================
